p: The diagnostic parameters of both indirect ELISA and nested PCR for all samples were evaluated in the absence of a gold standard using the BAI. This revealed agreement for these two assays to be better in the positive than in the negative direction with a BAI of 75.5% (95% BCI 69.0–82.0%) in the positive agreement and 68.4% (95% BCI 59.0–76.0%) in the negative direction.
